compliant.legal provisions: Personal data must be processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently; and collected for specified, legitimate purposes.
Processing of special categories of personal data is allowed with explicit consent or for specific purposes.
Processing of personal data of children requires parental consent.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data must be limited to what is necessary for the purposes for which they are processed.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the specific purposes for which personal data will be used and ensure that data collection is limited to what is necessary for those purposes.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing must be based on consent or legitimate interests, and individuals should be informed about the sharing of their data with third parties.
non_compliant.amend: Provide clearer information on how personal data will be shared with Strategic Partners and obtain explicit consent from users.
